entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 08:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
